Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People have been buzzing about the upcoming Australian Federal Budget. With a reported boost in Defence money-wise there is a lot of speculation as to how this will impact the current pandemic climate. The Budget also has a focus on cracking down on text scams providing relief for energy costs and preventing electricity disconnections for struggling individuals. While the budget is sure to have significant financial implications discussions about women's issues gender inequality and human rights abuses must not be overshadowed.
